typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Do not have the handler permission to write!"

arguments.value: Do not have the handler permission to write!

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Do not have the handler permission to write!"

nodes.documentation:
Check if msg.sender is a Handler of this contract. It is used for setters.
If fail, throw PermissionException.
nodes.name: onlyHandler

nodes.documentation:
Set Handler contract for the contract. Owner must set one to initialize the Data contract.
Handler can be set by owner or Upgrader contract.

	 * @param	_handlerAddr	address of a deployed Handler contract.

	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner nor a registered Upgrader contract.

	 * @return	if Handler contract is successfully set.

Set Handler contract for the contract. Owner must set one to initialize the Data contract.
Handler can be set by owner or Upgrader contract.

nodes.name: addHandler

params._handlerAddr: address of a deployed Handler contract. 	 * exception	PermissionException	msg.sender is not the owner nor a registered Upgrader contract.

addHandler(address).return: if Handler contract is successfully set.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

addHandler(address).notice: Set Handler contract for the contract. Owner must set one to initialize the Data contract. Handler can be set by owner or Upgrader contract.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
